overview: A group of colorful characters carry a mirror through the streets of San Jos√© and leave it in the Central Park of the city. A crowd moves around the mirror. A passerby shouts in front of his own image: "be attentive to what is coming!" The mirror reflects, transforms and deforms reality. Produces stories and mirages.
tagline: Brief history of a park, a mirror and a crowd
title: Mirages
